body_html:
@peterjc123 , I noticed I have installed two different packages(0.1.12 and 0.2.1) . I deleted and uninstalled all (Anaconda + pycharm+pytorch) and then reinstalled them(Python 3.5.2+pytorch 0.1.12). And I think this problem has something to do with multiprocess. So I set the worker 0(I find the training becomes a little slower). For now, everything works well.
Thanks!
body_text:
@peterjc123 , I noticed I have installed two different packages(0.1.12 and 0.2.1) . I deleted and uninstalled all (Anaconda + pycharm+pytorch) and then reinstalled them(Python 3.5.2+pytorch 0.1.12). And I think this problem has something to do with multiprocess. So I set the worker 0(I find the training becomes a little slower). For now, everything works well.
Thanks!
body:
@peterjc123 , I noticed I have installed two different packages(0.1.12 and 0.2.1) . I deleted and uninstalled all (Anaconda + pycharm+pytorch) and then reinstalled them(Python 3.5.2+pytorch 0.1.12). And I think this problem has something to do with multiprocess. So I set the worker 0(I find the training becomes a little slower). For now, everything works well. 
Thanks!
